scripts.install:all: cd exchange && yarn && cd ../launcher && yarn && cd ../recording-oracle && yarn && cd ../reputation-oracle && yarn
scripts.local: concurrently "hardhat node" "yarn exchange"  "yarn launcher" "yarn recording-oracle" "yarn reputation-oracle" "yarn deploy:contracts" "yarn minio"
scripts.local:test: concurrently "hardhat node" "yarn exchange"  "yarn launcher" "yarn recording-oracle" "yarn reputation-oracle" "yarn deploy:contracts" "yarn minio-test"
